document_data.name: Cynda
document_data.mainbody: '''Cynda''' was a [[halfling]] ranger and the twin sister of [[Shan]]. She was also an accomplished aerialist in the [[Circus of Wonders]]. Her voice was damaged in a fight with an undead creature and she lost her ability to speak. Shan communicated with her sister using sign language.
document_data.Description: Cynda had long auburn and a large scar on her throat where her vocal cord had been cut.
document_data.Possessions: Like her sister, Cynda wore [[leather armor]] and used a [[short sword]]. She also carried darts to throw at her opponents.
document_data.History:
Cynda and Shan found many adventures together prior to joining the circus. After the circus was attacked by [[minotaur]] warriors from [[Calimport]], Cynda and her sister traveled with [[Cephas]] and [[Corvus Nightfeather]] to [[Almraiven]].

Cynda was abducted in Almraiven by two [[firesoul genasi]] and teleported to Calimport where she was forced to fight in the arena. Shan traveled with Corvus and Cephas to Calimport where Cephas was reunited with his father the [[Pasha]] but Shan was sent to the gladiator stables. The Pasha scheduled a fight between Cynda and Shan and made it the main event. Immediately prior to the twin's fight, Cephas tampered with the magic that [[levitate]]d the Pasha's palace and caused it to collide with the arena. In the confusion that followed, Cynda and Shan and friends were able to escape Calimport.
